alert.note: Alert for West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern West Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana and Wilkinson Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Hawk, or 21 miles southeast of Monterey, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Fort Adams and Dolorosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
